Welcome!

This is an interface to help communicate with the NFT contract and Marketplace contract. The frontend makes the use of near-api-js to communicate with the NEAR blockchain. The button below will sign you in using your NEAR testnet wallet.

Tokens In Account

Mint An NFT on our contract!


Put up on Sale For Marketplace!

(This is an approval to put your token up for sale with the price in NEAR)

(Find token id in the "Tokens In Account" section)

Query Our Contract!
